Class BuilderCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.starter.cli.command.BaseCommand
      • io.micronaut.starter.cli.command.BuilderCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConsoleOutput, java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Integer>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreateBuilderCommand, CreateLambdaBuilderCommand

    public abstract class BuilderCommand
extends BaseCommand
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Integer>
    Abstract class to be extended by interactive commands.

    3.8.0
